i<n; i++){\n            sum += nums[i];\n            map.putIfAbsent(nums[i], new TreeSet<>());\n            map.get(nums[i]).add(i);\n            \n        }\n        \n        boolean[] marked = new boolean[n];\n        \n        for(int i=0; i<m; i++){\n            int[] q = queries[i];\n            int idx = q[0];\n            int k = q[1];\n            \n            if(marked[idx]==false){\n                marked[idx] = true;\n                sum -= nums[idx];\n                if(map.get(nums[idx])!=null){\n                    map.get(nums[idx]).remove(idx);\n                    if(map.get(nums[idx]).size()==0)\n                        map.remove(nums[idx]);\n                }\n                \n            }\n            \n            while(k-->0 && map.size()!=0){\n                \n                Integer f_idx = map.get(map.firstKey()).first();\n            \n                if(f_idx==null) break;\n                marked[f_idx] = true;\n                sum -= nums[f_idx];\n                \n                      // System.out.println(\"i=\"+ i + \" f_dix=\"+f_idx+ \" sum=\" + sum + \" \" + map.get(map.firstKey()));\n                map.get(map.firstKey()).remove(f_idx);\n                if(map.get(map.firstKey()).size()==0)\n                    map.remove(map.firstKey());\n            }\n            \n            res[i] = sum;\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"mark-elements-on-array-by-performing-queries","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
